title: Create Vehicle Hierarchy
description:
Create:
1. Vehicle class with: String brand, int year, and method getInfo() that returns "brand (year)"
2. Car class that extends Vehicle and adds: int doors field
   Constructor should accept brand, year, and doors
instructions:
Create:
1. Vehicle class with: String brand, int year, and method getInfo() that returns "brand (year)"
2. Car class that extends Vehicle and adds: int doors field
   Constructor should accept brand, year, and doors

testCases.description:
Vehicle v = new Vehicle("Generic", 2020);
return v.getInfo();

Car c = new Car("Toyota", 2022, 4);
return c.getInfo();

Car c = new Car("Honda", 2023, 2);
return c.doors;

hints.text: Define a function using the java syntax. Don't forget the return statement if needed.
If stuck, try writing out the solution in plain English first, then convert to java code.
